mdRecord.dcterms:title: Medical instruments
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:medium: metal; plastic (organic material); glass (material); wood (plant material); paper (fiber product) [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Contents of a medical bag (bag not included). Includes: spiked wheel, 2 chrome cylinders, 3 hammers, stethoscope end, magnifying glass with holder, magnifying glass in leather case, adjustable tuning fork, hammer, aneurysm needle, convex lens, tongue depressors in leather case, ophthalmoscope in case, aesthesiometer, multifaceted crystal, 2 vials containing cloves and tobacco, empty vial, notebook with manual/chart, and Revised Physician's pocket manual.
Photographed by Claude Moore Health Sciences Library, Historical Collections and Services staff.
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: The University of Virginia Medical Artifacts Collection
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medical instruments or apparatus
